name: Seed Technology Research Department
P1_Title: Prof. Dr. Amany Mohamed Sallam Mohamed Department Director's Speech
P1: The Seed Technology Department plays an important role in evaluating and improving the quality of seeds associated with the Field Crops Research Institute.

Department_Achieviements.text: Publishing numerous scientific research studies annually in reputable scientific journals.

Department_Mission_Outer.title: Conduct morphological, chemical, biochemical, and molecular characterization of varieties, lines, and hybrids.
Verify the genetic purity of plant lines and hybrids.
Carry out chemical analysis of seed content to support breeding programs.
Conduct studies on seed treatments before planting and after harvest to improve quality.
Determine appropriate seeding rates through germination percentage and thousand-kernel weight evaluation.
Study the factors affecting seed quality, such as:
Conduct morphological, chemical, biochemical, and molecular characterization of varieties, lines, and hybrids.

Array_6.title: Technological and agricultural practices for seeds

subItems.text: Keeping pace with scientific advancement and all new developments in the seed sector.
Providing laboratory training for students and researchers.

Department_Mission_Inner_Central: Main Overview Of The Department's Core Missions
